title: Your DID for climate impact
description: Everyone should play a role in addressing the climate emergency? But what is my impact and how can I mitigate it?
solution: A platform to calculate your DID carbon footprint in minutes, receive guidance to take simple actions to reduce it, share and get incentives
experience: The life mission of Scott Poynton who impacted millions of hectares of forests to date. Team with strong NGO & entrepreneurial experience.
